document.full_text: the museum of fine arts, houston, is looking for a new director, but finding someone who can fill the shoes of peter c. marzio, who died in december, is a tall order.
document.title: the texas tribune: replacing a museum director who was a rare find
lines_and_colors: the museum of fine arts, houston, is looking for a new director, but finding someone who can fill the shoes of peter c. marzio, who died in december, is a tall order.
